sourcesContent:
<template>
    <form class="col-12 col-sm-10 col-md-8 cl-lg-6" @submit.prevent="addTodo()">
        <input
                v-model="newTodo"
                type="text"
                class="form-control"
                placeholder="Create a new todo"
        />
    </form>
</template>

<script>
    export default {
        data() {
            return {
                newTodo: ""
            };
        },
        methods: {
            addTodo() {
                if (this.newTodo.length > 0) {
                    this.$emit("on-new-todo", this.newTodo);
                }
                this.newTodo = "";
            }
        }
    };
</script>
